DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate whether daily oral micronized progesterone effective preventing recurrent spontaneous preterm birth ( RSPB ) whether micronized progesterone use increase maternal serum progesterone level .
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate whether 400 mg daily oral micronized progesterone 16 34 week ' effective prevent recurrent spontaneous preterm birth ( RSPB ) whether micronized progesterone use increase maternal serum progesterone level .
DOC.criteria: pregnant woman le 20 week ' gestation least one prior spontaneous preterm birth liveborn baby 20 & 0/7 week ' 36 & 6/7 week ' gestation . multiple gestation , presence major fetal anomaly , progesterone use current pregnancy ( ongoing past ) , presence cervical cerclage , presence placenta previa .
